trans-unit.source: Enable logging:Enables additional logging to system log during login process.
Organisations:A comma-separated list of organisations. All users assigned to one of that organisation are able to login.
Create admin users by default:If enabled, all signed in users will be admins. Use with caution!
Backend user group uids:A comma-separated list of backend user uids to assign (works only if adminByDefault if disabled)
Create admin users by email address in file:A local path or url pointing to a file that contains email addresses (one per line) that should be given admin access to the system.
